text: Zak Butters (born 8 September 2000) is a professional Australian rules footballer who plays for the Port Adelaide Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL) He was recruited by Port Adelaide with the 12th draft pick in the 2018 AFL draft. Butters grew up in Bacchus Marsh and attended Maribyrnong College as part of their selective sports academy. ==AFL career== Butters made his AFL debut in Port Adelaide's win over Melbourne in the opening round of the 2019 AFL season.. He scored two goals on debut. He was named in the 40 man All Australian team in 2020 ==References== ==External links== * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Port Adelaide Football Club players Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Zak Butters
